description.value: You adapt to your surroundings in any natural terrain. You can spend 1 hour practicing in your current terrain in order to make it your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Favored Terrain]{Favored Terrain}, replacing your current favored terrain temporarily. If you spend a full day out of the new favored terrain, your favored terrain reverts back to your original choice when you took the Favored Terrain feat.
